programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.sub-title: The Widow And The Wolf / Texas Drifter
programme.desc: After the murder of her aunt goes cold, a woman helps launch an advocate group.

programme.desc: A Texas woman's murder is finally solved.

programme.title: Cold Case Files
programme.sub-title: Devil In Disguise
programme.desc: A 23-year-old teacher vanished the evening before Easter after giving confession.

programme.title: Cold Case Files
programme.sub-title: Friday Night Ghosts
programme.desc: In late 1983, the bodies of 5 people are found brutally murdered in an oil field.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.sub-title: Unholy Bible/The Answer In The Box
programme.desc: The cold murder case of a Texas woman is solved.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.sub-title: Mark Of A Killer (#27)/Portrait (#18)
programme.desc: A killer's bite marks and a jailhouse snitch lead to a murder conviction in a case gone cold for eight years, and a group of super sleuths try to solve the slaying

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.sub-title: Innocence Stolen / Danger at the Door (#112)
programme.desc: A district attorney uses a clever technique--a "John Doe indictment"--to give law enforcement officials the time they need to track down the Schoolgirl Rapist from Rochester, N. Y.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.sub-title: Killer on Campus / The Bow Hunter
programme.desc: Police use DNA found on pantyhose to finally track down the killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.sub-title: Lady In The Box (#33)
programme.desc: The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box
